advisories.title: Amazon Linux 2 2017.12 - ALAS2-2021-1703: medium priority package update for glibc
advisories.description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2021-35942:
	An integer overflow flaw was found in glibc that may result in reading of arbitrary memory when wordexp is used with a specially crafted untrusted regular expression input.
1977975: CVE-2021-35942 glibc: Arbitrary read in wordexp()
